name: ESPN NBA 2K5
description: ESPN NBA 2005 offers a new level of realism, from the natural team movements to the evolution a real team experiences. The incredible graphical realism practically make you feel like you're courtside; Advanced IsoMotion2 improves the exciting dribble system for spins, crossovers, and fakes outside the perimeter and in the post. The new 24/7 game feature offers 100 new items, timed mini-games, multiplayer action and a new respect level.
